DOC.brief_summary: This Phase II dose-ranging study evaluate effectiveness safety DA-9801 treatment pain associate diabetic neuropathy . Subjects receive either 300mg , 600mg , 900mg placebo , three time daily eight week . During treatment , pain score Likert numerical rating scale , Patient Global Impression Improvement ( PGI-I ) Change Clinical Global Impression ( CGI ) access evaluate effectiveness .
DOC.brief_title: Study DA-9801 Treat Diabetic Neuropathic Pain
